question_text_en: How would you describe your overall experience with our service today?
question_text_tl: Paano mo ilalarawan ang kabuuang karanasan mo sa aming serbisyo ngayon?

question_text_en: What did you think about the service staff's politeness and accommodation?
question_text_tl: Ano ang masasabi mo tungkol sa pakikitungo ng aming mga staff?

question_text_en: Were the instructions clear? If not, what part was unclear?
question_text_tl: Maliwanag bang naiparating ang mga instruksiyon sa iyo?

question_text_en: Did you encounter any difficulties? Please describe them.
question_text_tl: May naranasan ka bang problema sa aming serbisyo? (Maaari mo bang maipaliwanag?)

question_text_en: What aspects of the service process did you find most helpful?
question_text_tl: Anong mga aspeto ng proseso ng serbisyo ang pinaka-nakatulong sa iyo?

question_text_en: What was your overall impression of the waiting area?
question_text_tl: Ano ang iyong kabuuang impresyon sa lugar ng paghihintay?

question_text_en: How would you describe your mood during the waiting process?
question_text_tl: Paano mo ilalarawan ang nararamdaman mo habang naghihintay?

question_text_en: How did you feel about the time it took to resolve your issue?
question_text_tl: Ano ang pakiramdam mo tungkol sa tagal ng oras na kinuha para maayos ang iyong problema?

question_text_en: How would you describe the cleanliness and maintenance of the waiting area?
question_text_tl: Paano mo ipaliliwanag ang kalinisan at pangangalaga ng lugar ng paghihintay?

question_text_en: Were there any distractions in the waiting area that affected your experience?
question_text_tl: Mayroon bang mga sagabal sa lugar ng paghihintay na nakaapekto sa iyong karanasan?
